name: Hussein Mohamed
title: Junior Data Engineer – Microsoft Azure
careerObjective: Aspiring Data Engineer enrolled in the AI & Data Science – Microsoft Data Engineer track under the Digital Egypt Pioneers Initiative. Seeking an entry-level or internship role to apply skills in SQL, Python, data pipelines, and Microsoft Azure to build scalable and reliable data solutions.

training.track: AI & Data Science Track – Microsoft Data Engineer
details: Studying data engineering using Microsoft tools and cloud platforms
Designing data pipelines and preparing datasets for analytics and AI workloads
Covering SQL optimization, advanced Python, big data processing, and deployment concepts
Built reusable UI components using Angular and TypeScript, following clean and modular architecture
Worked in a remote Agile environment using Git and task management tools
Optimized SQL Server queries, strengthening practical experience in query optimization and data handling
Developed RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.js

projects.name: Capstone Project – Data Engineering Solution
details: Designed an end-to-end data pipeline using Python and SQL
Cleaned, transformed, and prepared raw data for analytics
Applied Microsoft Azure data engineering concepts for deployment readiness
